html:
{% set extra = extended_bil_extra_data(doc) %}

{{ doc.company }}
{{ extra.address }}

Tanggal : {{doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }} {{doc.get_formatted("posting_time")}}
Nama : {{ doc.title }}
Order : {{ extra.order_id }}
Kasir : {{ doc.owner }}
{%- for item in doc.items -%}

{{ item.item_name }}
{{ item.qty }} @ {{ item.get_formatted("rate") }}
{{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{%- endfor -%}

{{_("Subtotal")}}

{{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}

{%- if extra.tax.name -%}

{{ extra.tax.name }}

{{ extra.tax.total }}

{%- endif -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%}

{{_("Discount")}}

{{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}

{%- endif -%}

{{_("Grand Total")}}

{{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}

{%- if doc.rounded_total -%}

{{_("Rounded Total")}}

{{ doc.get_formatted("rounded_total") }}

{%- endif -%}
name: POS Extended Bill
